context.p: Now that you have installed and configured Eucalyptus, you're ready to start using it. To do so, you must generate credentials.
context.note:
When you run the euca_conf --get-credentials command,
you are requesting the access and secret keys and an X.509 certificate and key. You cannot retrieve an existing X.509 certificate and key. You can only generate a new pair.
